title: Genomic Human Variant
description: Schema for submitting a genomic human variant.

rsid.title: Variant ID
rsid.description: An external ID for the variant like dbSNP.
rsid.comment: This is currently only accepting rsIDs.

chromosome.title: Chromosome
chromosome.description: The number (or letter) designation for the chromosome, e.g. chr1 or chrX.

refseq_sequence_id.title: RefSeq Sequence Identifier
refseq_sequence_id.description: The RefSeq identifier for this variant. If there is no RefSeq identifier available for this variant, the seqeunce should be used instead.

items.description: Genome-wide association studies which distinguished this variant as potentially causative and from which it was selected from.
items.comment: This should be submitted as the accession number of the GWAS from the NHGRI-EBI Catalog of human genome-wide association studies.
